body:
SELECT
    *
INTO
	#tmpInno
FROM
    dbo.push_TheCao_CRM_innovation (NOLOCK)
WHERE
    CONVERT(DATE, CreateDate) = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE())
    AND ShopCode = '$CURSOR$'
    AND U_status = 1;

SELECT
      T.Mpos_DocEntry
	, T.Eplcode
	, T.Saleoder_ID
	, T.Bill_Code
	, T.Type
	, T.TongTien
	, ISNULL(P.Mocash, 0) AS Mocash
	, ISNULL(P.Mocard, 0) AS Mocard
	, P.ID
INTO
	#tmpInnoThuTien
FROM
    #tmpInno T
		LEFT JOIN dbo.Push_ThuTien_TheCao_ThuHo_innovation P (NOLOCK)
			ON T.Mpos_DocEntry = P.Mpos

SELECT
    T.Mpos_DocEntry
	, T.Type
	, T.TongTien
	, T.Saleoder_ID
	, T.Bill_Code
	, SUM(T.Mocash) + SUM(T.Mocard) AS TongThuTien
FROM
    #tmpInnoThuTien T
GROUP BY 
	  T.Mpos_DocEntry
	, T.Type
	, T.TongTien
	, T.Saleoder_ID
	, T.Bill_Code
HAVING
	SUM(T.Mocash) + SUM(T.Mocard) <> TongTien

/*
SELECT
	  Eplcode
    , SUM(TongTien) AS TongTien
INTO
	#tmpInnoEpl
FROM
    dbo.push_TheCao_CRM_innovation (NOLOCK)
WHERE
    CONVERT(DATE, CreateDate) = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE())
    AND ShopCode = '30418'
    AND U_status = 1
GROUP BY
	Eplcode
*/
